sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form
        ref="form">
        <v-dialog v-model="show" max-width="600" persistent>
            <v-card flat outlined class=" mt-2 rounded-0">
                <v-card-title>
                    {{ isEdit ? "Edit Plan Details" : "Enter New Plan Details" }}
                </v-card-title>
                <v-card-text>
                    <v-text-field
                        v-model="newPlanName"
                        label="Name"
                        dense
                        class="rounded-0"
                        outlined>
                    </v-text-field>
                </v-card-text>
                <v-btn
                    @click="close">
                    Close
                </v-btn>
            </v-card>
        </v-dialog>
    </v-form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'TestDialog',
    data() {
        return {
            newPlanName: '',
            diaglogData: '',
        }
    },
    props: {
        value: Boolean,
        plan: Object,
    },
    watch: {
        planName() {
            console.log(this.planName)
        },
        value(val) {
            if (val) {
                // this.newPlanName = this.plan.name
                console.log('change: ', val)
                console.log('change this.plan: ', this.plan)
                // this.newPlanName = ''
            }
        },
    },
    computed: {
        show: {
            get() {
                return this.value
            },
            set(value) {
                this.$emit('input', value)
            },
        },
        planName: {
            get() {
                console.log('get plan.name: ', this.plan.name)
                return this.plan.name
            },
            set(val) {
                console.log('set planName: ', val)
                console.log('set plan.name: ', this.plan.name)
            }
        },
        isEdit: {
            get() {
                if (this.plan.id > -1)
                    return true
                else
                    return false
            }
        },
    },
    methods: {
        close() {
            this.planName = this.plan.name
            console.log('close planName: ', this.planName)
            this.show = false
            // this.$refs.form.reset()

            console.log('close after reset planName: ', this.planName)
        }
    },
    mounted() {
        console.log('mounted firing')
    },
    created() {
        console.log('created firing')
    }
}
</script>
